attributes.action: bring about tougher laws and stronger sentences to paedophiles and perpetrators of sexual crimes and to address the massive and urgent need for goverment funded support and therapy at a local level and more importantly, at the point of need for survivors of rape and abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The victims of these crimes are given a life sentence, and as such the punishment should fit tthe crime.Three-quarters of sexually abused children do not tell anyone about the abuse at the time, and approximately a third still have not told anyone about their experience(s) by early adulthood.
0ne in three girls and one in five boys will be abused in their life time.
More than 25 percent of all rapes recorded by the police are commited against children under 16 years of age.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
